languages.text: "Одного из арбитров я дотащил до лазарета, парень умер от ран. Итог: цель не выполнена, десять человек из состава потеряны, а их командир почему-то жив. Я малодушно рассчитывал на казнь, но маршал отправил меня гнить на Веабос-6 — и правильно поступил".

"I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."
languages.original_text: "Одного из арбитров я дотащил до лазарета, парень умер от ран. Итог: цель не выполнена, десять человек из состава потеряны, а их командир почему-то жив. Я малодушно рассчитывал на казнь, но маршал отправил меня гнить на Веабос-6 — и правильно поступил".

traits.locale_text: "I managed to drag one of the arbitrators to the infirmary, the man died of wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten men were lost, and their commander was alive for some reason. I cowardly hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI, and he was right to do so."

"I managed to drag one of the arbitrators to the infirmary, the man died of wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten men were lost, and their commander was alive for some reason. I cowardly hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI, and he was right to do so."

"I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten men were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

languages.text: 「俺はなんとかアービトレイターの一人を治療所に引きずっていった。その男は傷が元で死んだ。結論としては、目的は達成されず、アービトレイターが10人失われ、その司令官はどういうわけか生き残った。臆病者のように処刑されることを望んだけど、将帥は俺をヴィアボス・VIで腐らせることにした。そして彼の判断は正しかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はなんとかアービトレイターの一人を治療所に引きずっていった。その男は傷が元で死んだ。結論としては、目的は達成されず、アービトレイターが10人失われ、その司令官はどういうわけか生き残った。臆病者のように処刑されることを望んだけど、将帥は俺をヴィアボス・VIで腐らせることにした。そして彼の判断は正しかったんだ」

languages.text: "Ich konnte einen der Arbitratoren bis ins Lazarett schleppen. Der Mann starb an seinen Wunden. Endresultat: Das Einsatzziel wurde nicht erreicht, zehn Arbitratoren verloren ihr Leben, nur ihr Commander hatte es irgendwie überlebt. Wie ein Feigling hoffte ich darauf, hingerichtet zu werden, aber der Marschall schickte mich stattdessen nach Vheabos-VI, und das war auch richtig so."
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich konnte einen der Arbitratoren bis ins Lazarett schleppen. Der Mann starb an seinen Wunden. Endresultat: Das Einsatzziel wurde nicht erreicht, zehn Arbitratoren verloren ihr Leben, nur ihr Commander hatte es irgendwie überlebt. Wie ein Feigling hoffte ich darauf, hingerichtet zu werden, aber der Marschall schickte mich stattdessen nach Vheabos-VI, und das war auch richtig so."

languages.text: « J'ai réussi à ramener l'un des arbitrators jusqu'à l'infirmerie. Il a succombé à ses blessures. Résultat de la mission : l'objectif n'avait pas été atteint, dix arbitrators étaient tombés au combat, laissant derrière eux un commandant indemne, contre toute attente. Comme un lâche, j'ai espéré que le maréchal me ferait exécuter. Mais il a préféré m'envoyer croupir sur Vhéabos-VI. Comme de juste.
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai réussi à ramener l'un des arbitrators jusqu'à l'infirmerie. Il a succombé à ses blessures. Résultat de la mission : l'objectif n'avait pas été atteint, dix arbitrators étaient tombés au combat, laissant derrière eux un commandant indemne, contre toute attente. Comme un lâche, j'ai espéré que le maréchal me ferait exécuter. Mais il a préféré m'envoyer croupir sur Vhéabos-VI. Comme de juste.

languages.text: «Logré arrastrar a uno de los Arbitrator hasta la enfermería, pero sucumbió a sus heridas. En conclusión: el objetivo se quedó sin cumplir, diez Arbitrator perdieron la vida y su comandante sobrevivió de alguna manera. Esperaba que me ejecutasen como a un cobarde, pero en vez de eso el mariscal me envió a Vheabos VI para que me pudriese. E hizo bien».
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Logré arrastrar a uno de los Arbitrator hasta la enfermería, pero sucumbió a sus heridas. En conclusión: el objetivo se quedó sin cumplir, diez Arbitrator perdieron la vida y su comandante sobrevivió de alguna manera. Esperaba que me ejecutasen como a un cobarde, pero en vez de eso el mariscal me envió a Vheabos VI para que me pudriese. E hizo bien».

languages.text: “我把一名还没断气的法务官拖到了医务室，到了最后，那个人伤重而死。这已经违反了底线——任务目标没完成，法务部损失了十名法务官，而不知为何，他们的指挥官居然还活着。我像个懦夫一样，请求元帅把我处死，可他却把我送到了维博斯六号星。他确实应该这么做。”
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: “我把一名还没断气的法务官拖到了医务室，到了最后，那个人伤重而死。这已经违反了底线——任务目标没完成，法务部损失了十名法务官，而不知为何，他们的指挥官居然还活着。我像个懦夫一样，请求元帅把我处死，可他却把我送到了维博斯六号星。他确实应该这么做。”

languages.text: "Yargıcılardan birini revire kadar sürükledim. Adam yaraları nedeniyle öldü. İşin özeti şu... Görev başarısız oldu, on Yargıcı hayatını yitirdi ama komutanları bir şekilde hayatta kaldı. Korkak gibi infaz edilmeyi umut ettim ancak Miralay beni çürümek üzere Vheabos VI'ya gönderdi. Bu kararı vermekte haklıydı."
languages.original_text: "I managed to drag one of the Arbitrators to the infirmary. The man died of his wounds. Bottom line: the objective was not accomplished, ten Arbitrators were lost, and their commander was somehow left alive. Like a coward, I hoped to be executed, but the Marshal sent me to rot on Vheabos VI instead, and he was right to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcılardan birini revire kadar sürükledim. Adam yaraları nedeniyle öldü. İşin özeti şu... Görev başarısız oldu, on Yargıcı hayatını yitirdi ve bir şekilde komutanları hayatta kaldı. Bir korkak gibi infaz edilmeyi umut ettim ancak Miralay onun yerine beni çürümek üzere Vheabos VI'ya gönderdi ve bu kararı vermekte haklıydı."
